title: Cyberpunking with Ron Funches
description: We're a bit late to the Cyberpunk 2077 party, but better late than never! Chris Plante will be back soon, but the world-renowned @RonFunches has stepped in to fill his shoes this week. Is Cyberpunk truly that heinous, or is it all a ruse? And can we possibly find a way to make hacking minigames fun? All will be revealed.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)

And can we possibly find a way to make hacking minigames fun? All will be revealed.
